title: Interpretation of thunder in a dream: seeing lightning in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of hearing the sound of thunder for an unmarried woman, a pregnant woman, a married woman, and a married woman. I was struck by intense lightning according to Ibn Sirin. Thunder in a dream indicates a person’s threat, menace, and thunder, and the Arabs used to say: It thunders and flashes, meaning it threatens and threatens. Thunder in dreams also indicates good promises and generous orders, Because it is one of the orders of the King of the Clouds to rise up and be generous to whomever it is sent to and sent to. Thunder in a dream refers to war drums and clouds in this interpretation mean soldiers and lightning symbolizes weapons, things, flags and rain. Whoever sees thunder in the sky receives orders from the ruler or authority, and thunder It also symbolizes the messages that the ruler sends to the ruled. Whoever sees in his dream thunder accompanied by rain, and the world is in need of it, then the dream refers to beneficial rain or dates that the fortuneteller will be rewarded or benefit from. Thunder in a dream can be good news, because in Waking life gives good news to rainy people. If the owner of the dream or vision is someone who is harmed by the rain, such as the traveler, the builder, and others, then this is the interpretation of real rain in its wake that can harm or spoil what the dreamer has done or done. Hard to. Or flooded by rain. Thunder in the summer indicates an unexpected event for the fortuneteller and is a warning against making wrong or inappropriate decisions. If the dreamer sees lightning with thunder, then the meaning of thunder is confirmed in what it refers to, and if the thunder indicates rain, then the dream will come true soon. May Thunder with lightning in a dream indicates good news that the dreamer receives from the ruler (or a government agency nowadays). Governor or official. Thunder without rain in a dream indicates fear, which in some interpretations refers to wars or famines, and the dream may indicate natural disasters and other bad events that the dreamer may not experience or be affected by, but may see or be affected by. It leaves in him a little despair and sadness. Seeing thunder in a dream sometimes indicates spending or paying off debts, and thunder in a sick person’s dream indicates recovery, and in a prisoner’s or his family’s dream it indicates innocence and release. Thunder, lightning, and rain show the traveler’s fear and insecurity in his journey. He also said: Thunder is a policeman or A great person who supports the dreamer, helps him, or is the reason for his salvation. Thunder without lightning indicates murder, cunning, lies, falsehoods, and great slander. The loud or loud sound of thunder in a dream indicates quarrels, disputes, or loud and sterile disagreements that leave strife and disputes. Seeing lightning and thunder - YouTube

title: Interpretation of white shoes in a dream and wearing white shoes in a dream

preview.html: The dream of white shoes indicates a pure heart, innocence, kindness and other interpretations. We will explain this to a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant man, a man, such as buying new or old white shoes, wearing clean or dirty white shoes, and I dreamed that my shoes were wide or narrow or torn, and I saw white shoes with a heel or flat shoes disappearing, and I dreamed that someone gave me shoes as a gift or gave them to Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Nabulsi, and more explanations in detail in the continuation of the topic. :Interpretation of the dream of white shoes by Ibn Sirin People mentioned in the interpretation of this vision white shoes in a dream, and it often indicates purity of intention and a good heart that does not carry sorrows, hatred or hatred towards anyone. It can also refer to the good feelings that the dreamer conveys towards others in real life. If a woman sees in her dream that she is wearing white shoes, her vision indicates her marriage to a good man. A kind-hearted person who cares about her happiness. Likewise, if a young man sees this vision in a dream, he will marry a righteous wife who will make him happy. On the other hand, the interpretation of seeing white shoes in a dream has reached that it may indicate the money that the dreamer gets while awake, but this money is often found and obtained on the way to the trip, and it was also said that this case may indicate the work from which the dreamer earns a lot of benefit and money, and perhaps the vision indicates travel and movement between countries, where the viewer finds kindness, benefit and livelihood. This vision may not be interpreted well, as it indicates that you receive bad news and live bad events and enter a bad and difficult period. Buying white shoes in a dream expresses having children When the fortune teller sees white shoes in a dream, this indicates good, and some commentators have said that wearing white shoes means money, and some of them said that it indicates travel. As for seeing white shoes in the dream of an unmarried young man, the vision indicates marriage. If a married man sees himself buying shoes in a dream, this is divine providence, and it is said that work is for those who do not have work. Seeing the loss of white shoes in a dream or forgetting it somewhere, which suggests travel Some commentators said Seeing travel and walking in one person is also travel. For a married woman, wearing white shoes in a dream means a lot of money for her on the road and it is said that it indicates pregnancy. Stealing white shoes in a dream for a married woman shows family problems and it is said that divorce. Giving up white shoes in a dream is good for her, she is coming on the road, God willing, the Blessed and Most High. For a pregnant woman, seeing white shoes in a dream is a great pleasure, and wearing them is beneficial for her and her child. Losing shoes in a pregnancy dream indicates health problems during pregnancy. Giving white shoes in a dream for a pregnant woman, it looks good on her as well as a married woman. For a divorced woman, seeing white shoes in a dream is good for her. Wearing white shoes for a divorced woman

preview.html: Dreams of the dead: Some people see a dead person alive in their dream, and this dream may be a longing for the dead person and his need for him, especially if he is a family member. What is the interpretation of a dream about a dead person alive? ; What interpretations do you confirm? We will learn about them in this article.Ibn Sirin’s dream of being aliveDreams of the deadThe interpretation of a dream about the dead indicates many things about the dreamer, some of which are good, and some of which may not be interpreted as happiness and goodness, but rather confirms falling into corruption and sin.If the deceased comes to the dreamer laughing and talks to him With love and sincerity, it is likely that he will be in a high position with God and enjoy a lot of goodness and success in his afterlife. Some experts predict that walking with a dead person in a dream and accompanying him is an indication that you will travel and go to a distant country to study or work, and God knows best. If the owner of the dream finds If the dead person is sleeping alone, then it can be said that he is in good condition in the afterlife and enjoys a lot of God’s blessing. Interpretation scholars consider that the sayings said by the dead to the living in the dream are honest words that are not tinged with lies, and therefore if you see the dead telling you some things, they are true and you should think In it.If the deceased was in a sad state and cried while talking to the dreamer, then the subject can explain the undesirable situation he is in at the present time. Ibn Sirin’s dream of being alive Ibn Sirin’s dream of a dead person indicates many different meanings depending on the state and circumstances that the dreamer is experiencing Which belonged to the deceased. This vision is generally considered to be a depiction of the soul and subconscious. It can be an expression of love and longing for the lost. If a dead person appeared in your dream and you met him in reality, that is, he was near you and spoke to you with tenderness and sincere love while smiling, then there is good news in this dream, which is the wonderful status in which he smiles. I have reached God. The scholar Ibn Sirin tells us that it is necessary to pay attention to the conversation that takes place with the dead person, and the dreamer must think about it and follow some of the meanings present in it; Because his speech is honest and true. He does not know how to lie. He says that the conversation that takes place between you and the deceased could be a sign of longevity, that you will live and enjoy contentment and peace of mind and be able to achieve the things you want. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a group of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google. Dreaming of a living dead for single peopleThe meaning of a dream about a dead person for a single person varies depending on her relationship with this person in reality. If he was her father, his vision could be said to be based on the conversation they had. He needs to think and reconsider some actions so that he does not become sad later. If a girl wants to be reassured about her father’s status after his death and comes to her while he is happy, God will give her good news through this dream of what her father has achieved through his good deeds. And his love for good deeds before his death. Some experts show that if a girl sees one of her neighbors talking to her or to others, he feels it

title: Interpretation of seeing my ex-husband and his mother in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing my ex-husband and his mother in a dream: A person throughout his life has many dreams and visions, some of which have meanings and some of which have no clear meaning or interpretation. The interpretation of seeing my ex-husband and his mother in a dream is as follows: Some commentators explained that seeing a divorced woman and her mother in a dream is evidence of the spouses returning to each other. A divorced woman seeing her ex-husband and his mother in a dream also means that her ex-husband’s mother was the cause of the divorce, as she came in her vision to ask for forgiveness and pardon. This vision also carries the meaning of the husband’s desire for his wife to return, and that he seeks to end the problems between his wife and his mother until things stabilize. Between them. If a divorced woman sees in her dream that her ex-husband’s mother looks sad, this indicates her extreme sadness over the separation, and that she is working hard to bring her husband back. But if a divorced woman sees her ex-husband’s mother chasing her in a dream, this is evidence of the closest good and livelihood in the life of the divorced woman. Interpretation Seeing my divorced wife in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. There are many interpretations of the scholar Ibn Sirin regarding the meaning of a divorced woman seeing her ex-husband in a dream, and these interpretations are as follows: The researcher Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a divorced woman in a dream of her ex-husband is evidence that the life of the divorced woman is far from the life of her ex-husband and her desire to start... A new life. But if the divorced woman sees her ex-husband in a dream and feels calm and comfortable, then this vision shows the divorced woman’s desire to return to her husband and is evidence of their love and a strong relationship between them and that you will marry again. But if the divorced woman sees her ex-husband in a dream and he is in an official appearance, this indicates He occupies a prominent position in his professional and professional life and he is working hard to bring back his ex-wife tonight. Interpretation of seeing my ex-husband tired in a dream. There are many visions that are mixed with their divine meaning, including an absolute vision of being tired in a dream, where the interpreters have explained different interpretations of this vision, and it can be represented as follows: If a divorced woman dreams that her ex-husband is in a bad condition, this indicates that he is suffering from some problems that are negatively affecting his life. However, if a divorced woman sees that her ex-husband is feeling sick in a dream, this vision symbolizes that her ex-husband needs her very much at this time and that he is suffering. From some health crises. Seeing your ex-husband in a dream when he is tired also symbolizes that he feels sad in his life after the separation and that he wants to return to his ex-wife and that he still needs her. Interpretation of seeing my divorced mother in a dreamDreams usually contain many clues and signals In reference to issues in our lives. Sometimes the vision carries many messages that people need to understand its meaning, and the content of the visions can come from the events of the subconscious mind and what we are going through or what we fear will happen in the future, and below we explain through the following points the interpretation of seeing my divorced mother in a dream is as follows: The divorced woman who sees The mother of her ex-husband in a dream indicates that the divorced woman will get into a lot of trouble in general

title: What is the interpretation of eating sweets in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Eating sweets in a dream Sweets are one of the foods that everyone prefers and wants to buy, but what is the benefit of actually seeing them? Or does the interpretation of the vision differ depending on the situation, the type of this sweet, and the person’s preference for it? In this article, we will talk about eating sweets in a dream and what are the different indicators of this vision? Interpretation of eating sweets in a dream. What is the interpretation of eating sweets in a dream? The meaning of the interpretation of eating sweets in a dream varies, but in general it indicates many good things. It is one of the visions that explain goodness. More than the bad. Eating sweets in a dream confirms the happy life that the dreamer will have. If a person sees a lot of sweets in a dream, this confirms his good morals, kindness, and good morals. Seeing sweets indicates the improvement of various human conditions, especially for the person who is suffering from some crises in His life. Giving candy to someone in a dream means intense love for the other party to whom this candy is given. This vision is for an unmarried person, because it is evidence of the approaching marriage or entry into an important project that will improve his life. What is the interpretation of eating sweets in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin believes that eating sweets and their presence in a person’s dream is evidence of the good that will come, God willing. This vision can confirm that there is a lot of money coming to the dreamer. If a person eats sweets and they taste good and delicious, and feel happy, this confirms his closeness to God, which is Always ready to do good and obey. Eating a lot of sweets in a dream confirms that there are many doors that will open for the dreamer to earn a living. Buying sweets indicates that the dreamer will enjoy psychological peace and tranquility in his life, after a difficult and painful moment has passed for him. Says Ibn Sirin: Giving candy as a gift to someone means that there is a good understanding between the fortuneteller and this person, and that he should get closer to him than that. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, search on Google, the Egyptian dream interpretation site. What is the interpretation of eating sweets in a dream? Al-Nabulsi believes that Sweets in a dream are livelihood, marriage, blessing and healing for him, and his share is the same. If the dreamer loses money and sees sweets in his dream, this means that he will recover this money and find it, God willing. Seeing someone eating dates in a dream portends happiness and pleasure in life and his life. Al-Nabulsi believes that An abundance of sweets in a dream is bad, because it indicates illness due to excessive consumption. What is the interpretation of eating sweets in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq? Imam Al-Sadiq believes that sweets in a dream are a sign of an abundance of blessings and sustenance in a person’s life, and if a person eats them, this is evidence of his freedom from distress in his life. If someone sees that he is making sweets, this is a good sign for him that a lot of money is on his way. Charismatic sweets are a way to express love as seen by Imam Al-Sadiq, in addition to that whoever buys them indicates his success in study or work and his ability to get rid of problems In his life. What is the interpretation of eating sweets in a dream by Ibn Shaheen? H

title: Interpretation of seeing cherries in a dream

preview.html: Today in this article, we present to you the interpretation of seeing cherries in a dream in different situations. Cherries are a delicious fruit that everyone loves because of their delicious taste and multiple benefits. Cherries are used in making many types of delicious desserts. But what does it mean to see cherry fruit in dreams? Does it indicate a good opinion or warn him of evil that may befall him? In the following lines of the encyclopedia, we will learn about everything related to seeing cherry fruit in a dream and the interpretations given to it. Interpretation of seeing a dream about cherries in a dream: Whoever is poor and sees in his dream that he is eating sweet cherries, and enjoys eating them, then this vision for him is good news from God Almighty that the days of The poverty in which he lives will soon end and will be replaced by days of prosperity and cover. It will compensate him for the pain he suffered in his life. Whoever is rich, his vision of cherries is interpreted as an increase in his money. Whoever sees in a dream that he is eating delicious cherry fruits, his dreams reflect the good morals that he enjoys and the good reputation for which he is famous among the people. It also appears that he is a compassionate person who loves charity and helps the needy. One of the visions that predicts the arrival of a lot of money to a person is that he sees in his dream that he is drinking cherry juice and enjoying the taste of this refreshing juice for the body. Among the bad visions is that a person dreams that he is eating cherries and that their taste is not delicious and he feels that their taste is hot and their strength has expired. This dream symbolizes that the dreamer will lose his money and get sick. It may symbolize that the dreamer is committing many sins, and it is a warning vision for him to stop committing these sins and return to the path of God Almighty and maintain worship and good morals. Interpretation of cherries in a dream for a single woman. Seeing cherries in an unmarried girl’s dream is one of the visions that bring her good news. . Likewise, it is promising for a girl to see that she is eating cherries in her dream, sees that they taste delicious and feels happy when she eats them. This dream indicates that there is someone who proposes to this girl and she agrees to marry him because she sees the characteristics of the boy she dreams of and will live with him who longs for her happiness. Interpretation of a dream about cherries in a married woman’s dream: Seeing cherries in different colors for a married woman is considered one of the praiseworthy visions that symbolize friendship and understanding. Between her and her husband, it also indicates that her husband is looking into what is permissible in his source of livelihood and that he does not accept it. It also indicates that this woman has good morals and a good reputation among those around her. She also enjoys strong friendships and her relationships with her relatives are interconnected and very deep. But a married woman who sees green cherries in her dream indicates the emergence of some problems in this woman’s life, but she will be able to overcome them. Her sight and salvation are upon her. If a pregnant woman sees that she is eating delicious cherries, then she is fortunate that her pregnancy will be completed without health problems, and she will also give birth to her fetus in peace and God will grant him health and wellness. Interpretation of a dream about picking cherries. Picking cherries in a dream varies depending on the details of the dream. Whoever dreams that he is picking ripe and good cherries, it is more likely that

title: Interpretation of seeing insects emerging from the body in a dream

preview.html: Do you dream of insects coming out of your hair? Find a solution to the problems that the dreamer is suffering from and make him think a lot. Do you see insects coming out of a man in a dream? An indication of the fortune teller’s difficulties in providing a decent living. Do you see a married woman picking insects from her hand? An indication of the nefarious intentions of her neighbors What does it mean to see insects coming out of the ear? The coming period of the dreamer’s life will be turbulent and unstable. Do you see small insects turning into large insects? Warning of growing problems and the inability to solve them. Interpretation of seeing many insects in a dream? An indication of the many responsibilities that come with them. It is borne by a woman. Interpretation of seeing insects coming out of the nose? A successful project or travel opportunity from which the dreamer will earn a lot of money. Seeing a dragonfly with hair in a married woman’s dream? An indication of improving her husband’s condition and her happiness in living with him. Interpretation of seeing insects coming out of the body in a dream. The vision heralds death Fatigue and a feeling of peace of mind. Seeing insects coming out of the hair in a dream indicates finding a solution to the problems that the dreamer is suffering from, which is the cause of overthinking and insomnia. While seeing insects coming out of the vagina of a married woman who does not give birth, announces that she will soon become pregnant and give birth to children who will have good offspring. As for An insect coming out of an unmarried girl’s vagina in a dream indicates the end of celibacy and the nearness of marriage. The previous vision in a pregnant woman’s dream shows the intense pain that she will feel during childbirth, but she and the fetus will be fine. While insects come out of her leg in a dream, this is a sign of the dreamer’s effort. In providing a decent life. As the vision symbolizes, the dreamer will travel from one country to another to find a better job. Interpretation of seeing insects coming out of the hand in a dream: If he sees married women removing insects from the hands in the dream, this indicates the malicious intentions of her neighbors. The vision indicates the need to be careful in Dealing with others and prefer to avoid them as much as possible. Feeling happy to see insects coming out of his hand is good news for the dreamer to achieve his goals and fulfill his desires after being tired. Seeing insects coming out of the ear in a dream. Dreaming about insects coming out of the ear symbolizes the coming period in the dreamer’s life that will be turbulent and unstable. The vision indicates that the dreamer will hear his sad news. The vision warns the dreamer of his enemies and that they are trying to discredit him. The vision symbolizes the dreamer’s confidence in himself and that he will try to achieve more success. In particular, flying from the man’s nose in the dream is a sign of his wife’s upcoming pregnancy. The vision indicates an optimistic outlook on worries. And problems and the desire to solve them. The vision also foretells the end of misery and unhappiness and the dreamer will gain a lot of sustenance and kindness. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream foretells that she will marry a person who will make her happy in her life. Seeing insects coming out of the nose also foretells a successful project or a travel opportunity from which he will gain income. The dreamer has a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about insects coming out from under the skin in a dream. See the point: Insects coming out from under the skin of the enemy and be someone close to the dreamer. It also symbolizes the enemy.

title: Interpretation of intercourse with the father in a dream: Seeing incest in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of a father cohabiting with a daughter, single, married, pregnant, if I dreamed of marrying my father, he was having sex with me naked, marrying me, and seeing a girl in her dream. Her parents had intercourse with Ibn Sirin. Seeing marriage and intercourse in a dream symbolizes the goodness of the actor and its subject. Seeing a man marrying his daughter and having intercourse with her in a dream indicates the presence of some problems and crises between the father and his daughter. These problems may be due to the difference in thinking between the two generations, the father and the daughter, or they may be due to the daughter’s attachment to something that is contrary to What the father wants. Most of the time, the father’s point of view on the matter is her correct point of view. As for seeing an unmarried or married girl whose father marries her and has intercourse with her in a dream, this vision indicates that that girl or woman will obtain benefit or good from her parents or that her parents will help her. . Overcoming a crisis or some trials.Interpretation of seeing a father having sex in a dream - YouTubeInterpretation of incest - YouTube
